title: Oh Lord Sesshomaru, Lord Sesshomaru I have news for you
body: You know how much you enjoyed that mini azir rework? You know, the one you loved more than anything? Good news mate, that guy is in charge of the swain rework, your gonna love the new swain, gonna love him more than you ever loved azir or sol, speaking of which, rumours same guy on sol too, gonna be sweeeeeeet.

replies.body:
I love their twisted rito logic regarding Sol.....

_"Lets make a **unique** champ! thats a change of playstyle to the other 150+ champs out there!! wooooo!"_

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/-2Z0Y3Kk8nU/maxresdefault.jpg


_"FUCK FUCK FUCK, WE DIDNT REALISE THAT BEING **UNIQUE** MEANT HE WOULD PLAY **DIFFERENTLY** TO EVERYONE ELSE!!!! FUUUUUUUUUUUUUCK!!! QUICK, REWORK HIM SO HE IS MUNDANE AND NORMAL AND JUST AS EQUALLY ACCESSIBLE AS THE OTHER 150+ CHAMPS OR WE MIGHT LOSE A COUPLE OF SALES ON THE NEXT SOL SKIN!!!"_

Like ffs, cant we just have the occasional 'out there' champ? 
If you don't like the hard-positioning playstyle of Sol, DON'T PLAY SOL! go play Garen or something.

I don't ask for Garen to be reworked for the people who want more of a challenge.
So why you gotta change Sol for the people who want less of a challenge?

Why..



{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} {{sticker:cass-cry}} {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}} {{sticker:sg-ahri-3}} {{sticker:sg-janna}} {{sticker:sg-lux-2}} {{sticker:sg-shisa}} {{sticker:sg-soraka}} {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

死亡如风，长伴吾身

暴动游戏，

你好玩家，我们爱钱，但是不你。
I mean, if you want to play a champion Like Sol, there is always Singed.
Singed doesn't require positioning though, you just run around slightly ahead of everyone spamming laugh.

im 1 token off m7 swain then i found this out...

rest in pepperinos birdman
